title: r/Storiesaboutkevin What It's Like To Live With A 75 IQ Kevin
description: r/Storiesaboutkevin In today's episode, we have story after story of OP's absolutely moronic roommate. This Kevin likes to hide coffee beans around the house, bake entire oranges, spread toxic chemicals all over the house, and just generally act like a total moron. If you like this video, hit the follow button for more daily Reddit content!
